oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: All Star Western Theatre - 1946-12-22 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of All Star Western Theatre radio program from December 22, 1946. Featuring Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage, with announcer Cottonseed Clark, and guest Dennis Moore.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Foy Willing; Riders Of The Purple Sage; Dennis Moore
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Radio play 'The Phantom Rider' (Dennis Moore, cast) [continued from part 1] -- Cottonseed Clark announces the cast -- Ragtime Cowboy Joe (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Cottonseed Clark talks -- Dark Eyes (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Weber's Bread commercial -- Cottonseed Clark introduces Foy Willing and Dennis Moore -- Foy Willing and Dennis Moore talk -- So Long To The Red River Valley (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Theme (Drifting Along, Singing A Song) -- Closing statement (Cottonseed Clark) -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: KNX (Radio station : Los Angeles, Calif.); All star western theatre (Radio program); Willing, Foy, 1914-1978; Riders of the Purple Sage; Clark, Cottonseed; Moore, Dennis, 1908-1964; Sloey, Al; Paul, Johnny (Violinist); Dean, Jimmy; Forte, Joe, 1893-1967; Lung, Charlie; Fields, Eddy; Sievert, Bud
